cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP address to an unreachable IP '10.0.0.1' will cause routing failures, preventing the CU from binding to the local interface for F1 connection to DU.

du.explanation_en: Setting the local N address to an unreachable IP '10.0.0.1' will cause routing failures, preventing the DU from binding to the local interface for F1 connection to CU.
du.explanation_zh: 將本地 N 地址設定為無法到達的 IP '10.0.0.1' 會導致路由失敗，防止 DU 綁定到本地介面以連接到 CU。
